org.apache.hadoop.tools

Class DistCpContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.tools.DistCpContext

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class DistCpContext
extends Object
    This is the context of the distcp at runtime. It has the immutable DistCpOptions and mutable runtime status.
